text:
CSV Data Set Config works once data is converted into ASCII.  It would be good
to see the documentation specify which encodings are supported.
creator: dleston@ebates.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
CSV Dataset has a "File Encoding" parameter which can be used to specify the 
encoding to be used.

This was not documented in the 2.3 release.
Added to SVN in r584430
